https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/78MWfEZyeMEgSCmIRd3sAlTiQH1.jpg After surviving a violent encounter, renowned pianist, Amber Waltz, relocates to a rural farmhouse to complete her latest symphony. When the music mysteriously begins writing itself, Amber slowly discovers that this piece could be her last. Amber's Descent
